title: Entering into a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between the Vietnamese People's Police Academy and the National Police Academy of Sri Lanka on Cooperation in Police Training and Scientific Research
decision_details: - Vietnam and Sri Lanka have agreed to enhance bilateral cooperation between the two countries for the prevention of crimes. As such, with a view to strengthening the cooperation through the exchange of updated information on Police Training and Scientific Research, the proposal made by Hon. Sagala Ratnayake, the Minister of Law & Order and Southern Development, to enter into a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between the Vietnamese People's Police Academy and the National Police Academy of Sri Lanka, was approved by the Cabinet.
